rows.label: bf11520100_0010
rows.name: How long have you been with Adel?

rows.label: bf11520100_0020
rows.name:
Hmmm... Three years maybe?
One year with Hikari.

rows.label: bf11520100_0030
rows.name:
When my village washed away in a flood,
Adel was the one that helped us out.

rows.label: bf11520100_0040
rows.name: Right... So it wasn't the war, then?

rows.label: bf11520100_0050
rows.name: No, it was.

rows.label: bf11520100_0060
rows.name:
Resources were running low, so we stripped the mountain bare.
That's what caused the flood.

rows.label: bf11520100_0070
rows.name: Nee-chan?

rows.label: bf11520100_0080
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Huh?

rows.label: bf11520100_0090
rows.name:
You were looking for your mother, right?
Did you get separated during the war?

rows.label: bf11520100_0100
rows.name: If only that were the case...

rows.label: bf11520100_0110
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Huh?

rows.label: bf11520100_0120
rows.name: There are some things you don't know...about me.

rows.label: bf11520100_0130
rows.name: Uh, things...?

rows.label: bf11520100_0140
rows.name: Mhm...

rows.label: bf11520100_0150
rows.name: Oh... OK...

rows.label: bf11520100_0160
rows.name: Mother used to work as hired help.

rows.label: bf11520100_0170
rows.name:
When I was about ten, she was working as a maid.
That was when Shin came into my life

rows.label: bf11520100_0180
rows.name: You were a Driver at ten?!

rows.label: bf11520100_0190
rows.name:
That's right.
Things immediately turned bloody.

rows.label: bf11520100_0200
rows.name:
I had to get out of there in a hurry.
Seventeen years later, here I am.

rows.label: bf11520100_0210
rows.name:
Wow, you don't look 27.
I would've said 20 at most.

rows.label: bf11520100_0220
rows.name: Hey. Flattery will get you everywhere.

rows.label: bf11520100_0230
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Hehehe.

rows.label: bf11520100_0240
rows.name: Well just like me and Sata, I guess.

rows.label: bf11520100_0250
rows.name:
Yeah.
Like plenty of kids out there.

rows.label: bf11520100_0260
rows.name:
That's why I'd like to help, stand by them.
Just like Shin alway stood by me.

rows.label: bf11520100_0270
rows.name: It's almost more real than real family.

rows.label: bf11520100_0275
rows.name: Right? Don't you think Sata?

rows.label: bf11520100_0290
rows.name:
What, no reaction?
I'm really trying here, you know!

rows.label: bf11520100_0300
rows.name:
Ah, it's fine.
He's smiling on the inside.

rows.label: bf11520100_0310
rows.name: Well now! You can tell?

rows.label: bf11520100_0320
rows.name: Sorta!

rows.label: bf11520100_0330
rows.name:
I see...
Well, I'm feeling all inspired now.

rows.label: bf11520100_0340
rows.name: Just the spirit we'll need if we're going to set this world to rights.

rows.label: bf11520100_0350
rows.name: Yeah!

rows.label: bf11520100_0360
rows.name: You can join in, you know.

rows.label: bf11520100_0370
rows.name: What's that?

rows.label: bf11520100_0380
rows.name: You don't need to ostracize yourself for being an Grail.

rows.label: bf11520100_0390
rows.name: That's not what I'm...

rows.label: bf11520100_0400
rows.name: I happen to think you've got a lot going for you, you know.

rows.label: bf11520100_0410
rows.name: [ML:undisp ][ML:Dash ]
